solution_line_template: The bear gained {berries_fraction} * {total_needed} = <<{berries_fraction}*{total_needed}={berries_gain}>>{berries_gain} pounds from berries.
Thus, it gained {remaining_after_berries_acorns} / {salmon_divisor} = <<{remaining_after_berries_acorns}/{salmon_divisor}={salmon_gain}>>{salmon_gain} pounds from salmon.
Therefore, the bear gained {remaining_after_berries_acorns} - {salmon_gain} = <<{remaining_after_berries_acorns}-{salmon_gain}={small_animals_gain}>>{small_animals_gain} pounds from small animals.
